prompts.title: Code Review Request
prompts.content:
Please review the following code for:
- Security vulnerabilities
- Performance issues
- Code quality and best practices
- Maintainability concerns

Code:
{code}

Context: {context}

prompts.title: Bug Analysis
Feature Design
Task Master Project Continuation

feature_name.description: Name of the feature to design

PRD_LOCATION.description: Location of the Product Requirements Document

PROJECT_REQUIRMENTS.default_value:
1. Unified file processing architecture with UnifiedFileManager
2. Cloud storage unification across all environments (DO Spaces)
3. Security architecture with private buckets and API-only access
4. All 4 user stories must work reliably (Direct, Draft, Scheduled, Override)
5. Complete migration from current fragile dual-file system

PROJECT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA.description: Critical success criteria for the project
PROJECT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA.default_value:
Reddit/YouTube file availability issues resolved
- Thumbnail stability guaranteed across all workflows
- Development/production parity achieved
- Security hardened with proper user authorization
- All platforms (Reddit, YouTube, Bluesky, Imgur) work consistently

CUSTOM_PROMPT.default_value: This is a critical system redesign that addresses fundamental architectural problems.\nQuality and reliability are prioritized over speed. Please review the current\ntask-master projects and resume implementation of this PRD immediately.
